snippet.title: Steel Legion Official Trailer - Modern Retro Metroidvania on the NES
snippet.description:
This is the official trailer for our upcoming game Steel Legion, a new NES homebrew game with a kickass soundtrack where you play as a cyborg exploring an interconnected world while finding secrets and abilities, meeting NPCs and battling bosses in order to destroy a dangerous AI.

The game will have a physical release for the NES in Q3-Q4 2024 through a crowdfunding campaign. 

Follow us on Substack to know more: https://aeonstarinteractive.substack.com/
Follow the game on itch.io: https://aeon-star-interactive.itch.io/steel-legion
Join us on Discord to talk about it: https://discord.com/invite/QZPKah3eRs

#nesgames #neshomebrewgames #nesdev #metroidvania #gametrailer
